this_title: Овечка Долли была злая и рано умерла
trans_title: 很凶恶的多莉羊很早就死了
OVECHKA DOLLI BYLA ZLAYA I RANO UMERLA
introduction: The main character — the young man Nikita, as a result of scientific experiment gets to the past where he should meet not only the young parents, but to find new friends and to find true love. He meets Masha. This meeting forces it to look at the life in a different way. However Nikita suddenly understands that starts growing old and escaping promptly he can only if returns back — in due time. But it’s not so simple ….
chinese_title: 很凶恶的多莉羊很早就死了
foreign_title: Овечка Долли была злая и рано умерла
